history.message:
Hi David,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear David,

Fantastic.

We'd love to have this piece in The Decadent Review.

I'll send an email with a draft by email (as registered at Submittable, please check as sometimes those end up in the junk folder).


Thank you, and health above all, yours,

D.

Dear David Jibson,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review
